item.title: New User
item.description: Open the New User Wizard from the menu File->New User. Or click the button.

item.title: Username
item.description: Username Enter your name. This will be used to store your personal test results and settings. Click Next.

item.title: Your own Language
item.description: Select your own language or another language that you are already fluent in, that you will use to help you learn the new language. If you are going to use multiple scripts (alphabets), you can specify the Script as well. Click Next.

item.title: Language to learn
item.description: Select the Language that you are learning. If you intend to store text in multiple scripts (e.g. an Asian script and a transliteration into Latin script), then specify the script that you want to use. You can add other scripts later.

subitem.label: Specify a font that will be used for this language. If you are learning a non-European language with its own script, then you will probably want to specify the font to use with it.

item.title: Finish
item.description: Click Finish to close the Wizard and create the User Project.
